name: LinktoPro.com
tag_list: find-a-professional, find-a-consultant, business-consultant, business-consultants, business-consulting, business-consulting-services, business-management-consultants, expert, experts, free-lancer, freelance, freelance-developer, freelance-it, freelance-pr
overview:
LinktoPro.com is a Technology Company that has created an On-Demand, Flexible Workforce Marketplace solution that creates a cost-effective alternate hiring solution and provides a full suite of Project Management tools for both industry and workforce.

While there are many freelance and temporary help websites, this site differentiates itself in the suite of Project and Business Management Tools it provides to all users allowing professionals to concentrate on delivering services, and allowing buyers to view an ongoing project with full transparency into activities.

The Professional or Consultant user is never charged a fee for use, and the Buyer of services is charged a nominal fee based upon a percentage of the total amount of services, once a project has been delivered. This fee is currently waived during their early adopter launch initiative.

The company’s Founder and CEO, Brian Menezes has a deep experience with broad-based roles in finance, operations and IT within private and public companies with international manufacturing operations such as Moog Automotive, Cooper Industries, Safety Components etc. and has held C-Suite positions as CIO, CFO, and CEO.

He earned his Business degree from the University of California at Berkeley, is a CPA, a S.C.O.R.E. volunteer and has served on a variety of boards, including the United Way and Gateway House.

LinktoPro.com Features include:

For BUSINESSES

  • Post a Project
  • Open a project to a global marketplace or privately invite a professional to a project. Set a budget and create specific goals.
  • Skill search and Matching through ProFinder
  • Bidding Tools Management
  • Manage and Track Projects - Communication tools include Workspace, Chat, Desktop/Screensharing/Collaborative Meeting Tools, Internal Mail System, Banking, Milestone Payments

For PROFESSIONALS

  • Ability to Create a Profile and market effectively. Build a resume, showcase experience and market skills to a global audience of businesses and future clients.
  • Search for Projects - Users receive project matches continuously with recommendation engine or may search for projects by key word and industry.
  • Bidding Tools Management
  • Manage and Track Projects - Communication tools include Workspace, Chat, Desktop/Screensharing/Collaborative Meeting Tools, Internal Mail System, Banking, Milestone Payments
